original_title: Ahora te vamos a llamar hermano
overview: Raoul Ruiz shot this film on March 28th, 1971, during the big peasant march in Temuco, Chile, when the bill that gave the full citizenship and civil rights to the Mapuche Indio people was approved. Raoul Ruiz listens to their painful stories.
title: Now We're Going to Call You Brother
